word:
Those who present the idea that the blind, the deaf, the lame, the deformed, will not receive the seal of God, are not speaking words given them by the Holy Spirit. There is much suffering in our world. To some suffering and disease have been transmitted as an inheritance. Others suffer because of 


                                    -392- 

accidents. Cause and effect are always in operation in our world, and always will be. . . .
